tool_description: Logs all role management operations with detailed metadata for compliance and security auditing.

operation_type.description: Type of operation: assign, revoke, modify, query, validate

operator_id.description: ID of person/system performing the operation

operation_result.description: Result of the operation: success, failure, pending

metadata.description: Additional operation metadata as key=value pairs

risk_level.description: Risk level of the operation: low, medium, high, critical

compliance_tags.description: Compliance framework tags for the operation

error_messages: Invalid operation type: Use one of [assign, revoke, modify, query, validate].
Invalid operation result: Use one of [success, failure, pending].
Invalid risk level: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Missing required fields: user_identifier, system_name, and operator_id are required.
Audit logging failed: Unable to write audit record to audit system.
usage: Provide operation_type, user_identifier, system_name, operator_id, and operation_result. Include justification and metadata for comprehensive audit trails, and set risk_level and compliance_tags for compliance reporting.

audit_id.description: Unique identifier for the audit record

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the audit was logged

log_status.description: Status of the audit logging operation

retention_period.description: How long the audit record will be retained
